subSubSection.paragraph:
Endagria ulula ab. pallidata Staudinger, 1892
, Dtsch. Entomol. Z. Iris 5: 284. As
ssp. pallidata Wagner, 1929
, Mitt. Münch. Ent. Ges. 19: 196.
TL: Amasia : « Hadjin , Marasch und Kara Hissar » [ Turkey ]. Type material ( syntypes ) in MHUB
